Comment = "" Tag = "Sales" Top = 261 Left = 35 Width = 331 Height = 118 BorderWidth = 1 TabIndex = 5 BackColor = 255,255,255 Name = "Container1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Refresh DIMENSION laColors(12)
laColors(1) = RGB(255,128,128) && RED laColors(2) = RGB(0,255,0) && GREEN laColors(3) = RGB(128,128,255) && BLUE
laColors(4) = RGB(255,0,255) && PINK laColors(5) = RGB(0,255,255) && CYAN laColors(6) = RGB(255,255,0) && YELLOW
laColors(7) = RGB(160,160,210) && BLUE2 laColors(8) = RGB(255,160,30) && ORANGE laColors(9) = RGB(200,140,140) &&
laColors(10) = RGB(96,196,96) && GREEN2 laColors(11) = RGB(255,200,200) && ROSE laColors(12) = RGB(200,200,200) && GREY
lnBlack = RGB(28,28,28) && BLACK lnWhite = RGB(255,255,255) && WHITE
lcTabela = This.Tag
SELECT "&lcTabela"
lnlargura = INT(This.Width / RECCOUNT()) lnAltura = This.Height
lcFldValor = This.Tag + "." + FIELD(1) IF FCOUNT() > 1 lcFldLegenda = This.Tag + "." + FIELD(2) ELSE lcFldLegenda = "" ENDIF
CALCULATE MAX(EVALUATE(lcFldValor)) TO lnMax
SCAN n = RECNO() lcObj = "label" + TRANSFORM(n) lcLeg = "lname" + TRANSFORM(n)
IF TYPE("This."+lcObj) <> "O" This.AddObject(lcObj,"label") This.AddObject(lcLeg,"label") ENDIF
WITH This.&lcObj. .BackStyle = 1 && opaque .Backcolor = laColors(IIF(n>12,n-12,n)) .Width = lnLargura lnValor = EVALUATE(lcFldValor) lnBarra = ( lnValor / lnMax) * (This.Height - 1 - 17) .Height = lnBarra .left = ((n-1) * lnLargura) + 2 .Top = lnAltura - This.&lcObj..Height - 17 .Tag = TRANSFORM(lnValor) .Caption = TRANSFORM(lnValor,'99,999,999' ) .FontSize = 8 .FontBold = .T. .Alignment = 2 .Visible = .T. ENDWITH
WITH This.&lcLeg. .BackStyle = 1 && opaque .Backcolor = lnWhite .ForeColor = lnBlack .Width = lnLargura - 2 IF NOT EMPTY(lcFldLegenda) .Caption = ALLTRIM(EVALUATE(lcFldLegenda)) ENDIF .left = ((n-1) * lnLargura) + 3
.Top = This.Height - 17 .Height = 17
.FontSize = 8 .Alignment = 2 .Visible = .T. ENDWITH ENDSCAN
This.Width = ((n) * lnLargura) + 3 ENDPROC

Top = 19 Left = 623 Height = 23 Width = 23 Picture = r:\sait\cia008\excel.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 9 ZOrderSet = 6 Name = "Excel"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if not opendbf('Cia') return .f. endif
sele temp1
With Thisform * Mada a Excel la consulta cNomcia = Allt(Cia.NOMCIA) cTitulo = .Caption cColumnas = '' cMascaras = '' OpenExcel(cNomCia,cTitulo,cColumnas,cMascaras)
EndWith
Sele cia use
ENDPROC

PROCEDURE Refresh DIMENSION laColors(12)
laColors(1) = RGB(255,128,128) && RED laColors(2) = RGB(0,255,0) && GREEN laColors(3) = RGB(128,128,255) && BLUE
laColors(4) = RGB(255,0,255) && PINK laColors(5) = RGB(0,255,255) && CYAN laColors(6) = RGB(255,255,0) && YELLOW
laColors(7) = RGB(160,160,210) && BLUE2 laColors(8) = RGB(255,160,30) && ORANGE laColors(9) = RGB(200,140,140) &&
laColors(10) = RGB(96,196,96) && GREEN2 laColors(11) = RGB(255,200,200) && ROSE laColors(12) = RGB(200,200,200) && GREY
lnBlack = RGB(28,28,28) && BLACK lnWhite = RGB(255,255,255) && WHITE
lcTabela = This.Tag
SELECT "&lcTabela"
lnlargura = INT(This.Width / RECCOUNT()) lnAltura = This.Height
lcFldValor = This.Tag + "." + FIELD(1) IF FCOUNT() > 1 lcFldLegenda = This.Tag + "." + FIELD(2) ELSE lcFldLegenda = "" ENDIF
CALCULATE MAX(EVALUATE(lcFldValor)) TO lnMax
SCAN n = RECNO() lcObj = "label" + TRANSFORM(n) lcLeg = "lname" + TRANSFORM(n)
IF TYPE("This."+lcObj) <> "O" This.AddObject(lcObj,"label") This.AddObject(lcLeg,"label") ENDIF
WITH This.&lcObj. .BackStyle = 1 && opaque .Backcolor = laColors(IIF(n>12,n-12,n)) .Width = lnLargura lnValor = EVALUATE(lcFldValor) lnBarra = ( lnValor / lnMax) * (This.Height - 1 - 17) .Height = lnBarra .left = ((n-1) * lnLargura) + 2 .Top = lnAltura - This.&lcObj..Height - 17 .Tag = TRANSFORM(lnValor) .Caption = TRANSFORM(lnValor,'99,999,999') .FontSize = 8 .FontBold = .T. .Alignment = 2 .Visible = .T. ENDWITH
WITH This.&lcLeg. .BackStyle = 1 && opaque .Backcolor = lnWhite .ForeColor = lnBlack .Width = lnLargura - 2 IF NOT EMPTY(lcFldLegenda) .Caption = ALLTRIM(EVALUATE(lcFldLegenda)) ENDIF .left = ((n-1) * lnLargura) + 3
.Top = This.Height - 17 .Height = 17
.FontSize = 8 .Alignment = 2 .Visible = .T. ENDWITH ENDSCAN
This.Width = ((n) * lnLargura) + 3 ENDPROC

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if not opendbf('Cia') return .f. endif
sele temp3
With Thisform * Mada a Excel la consulta cNomcia = Allt(Cia.NOMCIA) cTitulo = .Caption cColumnas = '' cMascaras = '' OpenExcel(cNomCia,cTitulo,cColumnas,cMascaras)
EndWith
Sele cia use
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontSize = 10 Caption = "P" Height = 18 Left = 22 Top = 283 Width = 11 Name = "Leyenda12"

Enabled = .F. Left = 360 TabIndex = 1 Top = 588 Visible = .F. Name = "vFecha1"
Caption = "Fecha" Enabled = .F. Left = 320 Top = 592 Visible = .F. TabIndex = 3 Name = "Leyenda1"
Enabled = .F. Left = 460 TabIndex = 2 Top = 588 Visible = .F. Name = "vFecha2"
Top = 588 Left = 560 Height = 25 Width = 70 Caption = "Consultar" Enabled = .F. Visible = .F. Name = "Boton1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Consultar * Iniciarlizar variables With ThisForm vFecha1 = .pageFrame1.Page3.vfecha1.dValue vFecha2 = .pageFrame1.Page3.vfecha2.dValue
*Limpiar GRID1 Sele temp1 ZAP .pageFrame1.Page1 .grid1.refresh
* Generar Consulta Abonos. *Sele * from cxc where cxc.ca = '1' and; * between (cxc.Fecha, vFecha1,vfecha2) into cursor temp
* Saldos Vencidos * Left Join clientes on Cxc.Numcli = Clientes.numcli ;
Sele * from cxc where cxc.Ca = '0' and ; cxc.saldo > 0 and ; between (cxc.Fecha, vFecha1,vfecha2) ; order by numcli,divisa,cxc.Venc; into cursor tempSaldo
Sele tempSaldo
* La fecha de Referencia es la 2.
* Pasar Datos de consulta a Cursor Sele TempSaldo Scan
*Buscar Nombre del Cliente Sele clientes =SEEK (tempsaldo.numcli,'Clientes','Numcli') cNomCli = clientes.nomcli
Sele temp1 Appen Blank Replace numcli with TempSaldo.numcli,; NomCli with cNomCli,; Conc with TempSaldo.Conc,; Numdoc with subStr(TempSaldo.Refer,3,10),; importe with TempSaldo.importe,; Saldos with TempSaldo.Saldo,; divisa with TempSaldo.Divisa,; fechaDoc with TempSaldo.Fecha,; Fvenc with TempSaldo.Venc,; tc with tempsaldo.tc
* Se Hacen casos para Filtrar columnas. Do Case
&& * No Vencido La Fecha del vencimiento es menor que la fecha actual Case tempsaldo.Venc >= vFecha2 Replace Temp1.NoVenc with TempSaldo.saldo
Case BETWEEN(TEMPSALDO.VENC,vFecha2-15,vFecha2-1) Replace Temp1.Venc15 with TempSaldo.saldo
Case BETWEEN(TEMPSALDO.VENC,vFecha2-30,vFecha2-16) Replace Temp1.Venc30 with TempSaldo.saldo
Case BETWEEN(TEMPSALDO.VENC,vFecha2-45,vFecha2-31) Replace Temp1.Venc45 with TempSaldo.saldo
Case BETWEEN(TEMPSALDO.VENC,vFecha2-60,vFecha2-46) Replace Temp1.Venc60 with TempSaldo.saldo
Case TEMPSALDO.VENC<= vFecha2-61 Replace Temp1.Venc60mas with TempSaldo.saldo
EndCase
sele tempsaldo EndScan
Sele temp1
*LLenar GRID2 .consulta2()
*LLenar GRID3 .consulta3()
*LLenar GRID4 .consulta4()
*Resfrescar GRID1 .pageFrame1.Page1.Grid1.Refresh
EndWith
ENDPROC
